creditline: Bequest of John R. Van Derlip in memory of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
description: Brocade, two pieces, tan silk, yarn embroidered. Piece A introduces mustard and blue into every other floral motif; in B the corresponding design is green and tan. In both pieced the center flower is rose and red. These pieces formerly used to upholster furniture of love-seat size. Modern machine made.
dimension:
44 x 23 in. (111.76 x 58.42 cm) (object part, a)
35 1/4 x 24 in. (89.54 x 60.96 cm) (object part, b)
title: Panel
